Instance Method# count()

iOS 13.0+iPadOS 13.0+Mac Catalyst 13.0+macOS 10.15+tvOS 13.0+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 6.0+

```
func count() -> Just<Int>
```

Available when `Elements` conforms to `RandomAccessCollection` and `Failure` is `Never`.## [See Also](/documentation/Combine/Publishers/Sequence/count()-5rrw2#see-also)
